name: GastrointestinalBleedingEpisodeAndRiskOfGIBleeding1
title: Gastrointestinal bleeding episode and Risk of GI Bleeding 1
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value sets contains gastrointestinal bleeding episodes to provide the estimate risk of GI bleeding when using the SDM tool),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who have had a gastrointestinal bleeding episode),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes SNOMED CT codes for gastrointestinal bleeding episodes),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that describe non-gastrointestinal bleeding episodes. Exclude oncologic etiology)
